tool_description: An API showing  all the latest Coronavirus News
name: Coronavirus live
title: Coronavirus live

api_list.name: Get individual News Source News
api_list.description: Get news about COVID from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://coronavirus-live1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coronavirus-live1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all covid news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about covid news from all over the world
